name: Краска для волос Garnier Color Naturals белое солнце 10
ingredients: Aqua / water cetearyl alcohol deceth-3 propylene glycol laureth-12 ammonium hydroxide oleth-30 lauric acid hexadimethrine chloride glycol distearate polyquaternium-6 ethanolamine silica dimethyl silylate p-phenylenediamine ci 77891 / titanium dioxide 4-amino-2-hydroxytoluene p-aminophenol ascorbic acid sodium metabisulfite olea europaea / olive fruit oil 2-methyl-5-hydroxyethylaminophenol dimethicone pentasodium pentetate carbomer resorcinol parfum / fragrance.
